name: Emergency Mayhem
description:
The citizens of Crisis City are panicking. Fires rage, bombs are ticking and monkeys have taken over the supermarket!

It’s mayhem in Crisis City!

Exclusively for Wii, Emergency Mayhem combines thrilling arcade driving with a huge range of crazy challenges. As the orders crackle through from Headquarters, race against the clock through the bustling streets of Crisis City. Once at the scene, gameplay switches to one of over 30 mini-games to solve unique crises from disarming bombs to herding escaped penguins to safety! Then it’s onto the next emergency, no time to waste!
